evidence.claim: Panacea utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
The company integrates with health data standards including FHIR and HL7.
Panacea is involved in handling X12 transactions which are essential for health insurance billing.
Panacea Healthcare employs Azure for scalable healthcare solutions.

icp.icp_reason: Panacea Healthcare Solutions uses X12 EDI for healthcare data exchange, aligning with ICP criteria.
